generic_technologies.name: Anti-Mass Deflectors
generic_technologies.description:
Your ships can move into and through asteroid fields.

When other players' units use SPACE CANNON against your units, apply -1 to the result of each die roll.

generic_technologies.name: Gravity Drive
generic_technologies.description: After you activate a system, apply +1 to the move value of 1 of your ships during this tactical action.

generic_technologies.name: Fleet Logistics
generic_technologies.description: During each of your turns of the action phase, you may perform 2 actions instead of 1.

generic_technologies.name: Light/Wave Deflector
generic_technologies.description: Your ships can move through systems that contain other players ships

generic_technologies.name: Neural Motivator
generic_technologies.description: During the status phase, draw 2 action cards instead of 1.

generic_technologies.name: Dacxive Animators
generic_technologies.description: After you win a ground combat, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.

generic_technologies.name: Hyper-Metabolism
generic_technologies.description: During the status phase, gain 3 command tokens instead of 2

generic_technologies.name: X-89 Bacterial Weapon
generic_technologies.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose 1 planet in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships that have BOMBARDMENT; destroy all infantry on that planet

generic_technologies.name: Sarween Tools
generic_technologies.description: When 1 or more of your units use production, reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1.

generic_technologies.name: Graviton Laser System
generic_technologies.description: You may exhaust this card before 1 or more of your units use SPACE CANNON; hits produced by those units must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able

generic_technologies.name: Transit Diodes
generic_technologies.description: You may exhaust this card at the start of your turn during the action phase; remove up to 4 of your ground forces from the game board and place them on 1 or more planets you control.

generic_technologies.name: Integrated Economy
generic_technologies.description: After you gain control of a planet, you may produce any number of units on that planet that have a combined cost equal to or less than that planet's resource value

generic_technologies.name: Plasma Scoring
generic_technologies.description: When 1 or more of your units use BOMBARDMENT or SPACE CANNON, 1 of those units may roll 1 additional die.

generic_technologies.name: Magen Defense Grid
generic_technologies.description: You may exhaust this card at the start of a round of ground combat on a planet that contains 1 or more of your units that have PLANETARY SHIELD; your opponent cannon make combat rolls during this combat round.

generic_technologies.name: Duranium Armor
generic_technologies.description: During each combat round, after you assign hits to your units, repair 1 of your damaged units that did not use SUSTAIN DAMAGE during this combat round.

generic_technologies.name: Assault Cannon
generic_technologies.description: At the start of a space combat in a system that contains 3 or more of your non-fighter ships, your opponent must destroy 1 of his non-fighter ships
